ygData.subject: Re: PKer?
ygData.msgSnippet: Handing in your book to the priest of discord gets you one thing; you now can kill or be killed by other players with red names above their heads. Nothing else
ygData.messageBody:
Handing in your book to the priest of discord
gets you one thing; you now can kill or be killed by
other players with red names above their heads. Nothing
else changes. No added bonuses. If you don't play on a
PvP server it really isn't worth it. And on PvP
players you don't have to hand in the book anyway. Very
few people become PK'ers on standard servers.
Remember you can only kill other players with RED names.
So it's really pretty lame. If you want to try a PvP
server I highly recommend Sullon Zek. I'm having a blast
there as an Iksar warrior. I can't wait to kick some
nuetral druid butt!! ^_^
